definition: to have completed the mourning period (traditional)/to have served one's time

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: The 54-year-old had promised during the campaign to serve out his term as mayor.
sentences.chinese: 當年54歲的朱立倫在競選中承諾將服滿市長任期。

sentences.english: He served three years of his four-year sentence and then was released for good behavior .
sentences.chinese: 他判刑四年，服滿三年後，因表現良好而提前獲釋。

sentences.english: Hicks will serve the final seven months of his sentence in the south Australia state prison.
sentences.chinese: 希克斯將在澳洲南部監獄服滿他刑期的最後七個月。

sentences.english: He was released from prison after serving a sentence of ten years.
sentences.chinese: 服滿十年刑期後，他從監獄裏被放出來。
